meanings.definition: Swollen or bloated due to pressure or excess fluid.
meanings.sent1: The distended balloon popped with a loud bang.
meanings.sent2: Her distended belly made her uncomfortable after eating too much.
meanings.sent3: The distended cheeks of the chipmunk made it look like it was storing nuts for winter.
meanings.sent4: The distended river burst its banks after heavy rainfall.
meanings.sent5: The distended balloon animal twisted into strange shapes at the party.

meanings.definition: Expanded or stretched beyond normal limits.
meanings.sent1: The distended rubber band snapped with a sharp twang.
meanings.sent2: The distended fabric of the old tent showed signs of wear and tear.
meanings.sent3: The distended marshmallow grew to twice its size when roasted over the campfire.
meanings.sent4: The distended road map unfolded to reveal hidden routes through the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The distended bubble gum blew up into a huge pink bubble before popping.
